[property]
# 指定运行的GPU
# Device ID of GPU to use for pre-processing/inference (dGPU only)
gpu-id=0

# Unique ID identifying metadata generated by this GIE
gie-unique-id=3


# 数据预处理
# 数据缩放
net-scale-factor=0.0039215697906911373

#0=RGB, 1=BGR
model-color-format=0

#
model-engine-file=/opt/models/yolov7/yolov7.engine
# label里的数量必须与num-detected-classes保持一致
labelfile-path=/opt/models/yolov7/labels.txt
num-detected-classes=80

parse-bbox-func-name=NvDsInferParseCustomYoloV5
custom-lib-path=/opt/models/yolov7/nvdsinfer_custom_impl_Yolo/libnvdsinfer_custom_impl_Yolo.so

# process-mode 1是对全帧进行推理，2是在上一个infer的检测框里进行推理
process-mode=1

# Data format to be used by inference， 0=FP32, 1=INT8, 2=FP16 mode    
network-mode=2

# 0: Detector  1: Classifier  2: Segmentation  3: Instance Segmentation
network-type=0

# Array of output layer names
output-blob-names=prob

# 0=Group Rectangles, 1=DBSCAN, 2=NMS, 3= DBSCAN+NMS Hybrid, 4 = None(No clustering)
# cluster-mode=2
maintain-aspect-ratio=1

interval=0
batch-size=1

[class-attrs-all]
# Maximum IOU score between two proposals after which the proposal with the lower confidence will be rejected.
nms-iou-threshold=0.5
# Detection threshold to be applied prior to clustering operation
pre-cluster-threshold=0.4
